Sports and Clubs: Active in womens` Cricket since school days; Captain of Assam Womens` cricket team; President, Womens` Cricket Association of India
Social And Cultural Activities: Involved in (i) North East Socio Cultural Organisation (NESCO); (ii) Jankalyan; (iii) social and welfare activities since student days; (iv)organised several State and National level programmes for mobilisation of youth
Special Interests: Sports, Cultural and promotion of womens` interest
Educational Qualifications: B.A. Educated at Gauhati University, Guwahati, Assam
Name: Narah,Smt. Ranee
Countries Visited: Australia, Bangladesh, Cuba, Pakistan, Singapore, Thailand, U.K. and U.S.A.
